attributes.action: Return the teaching of the WW2 Holocaust to the National Curriculum
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The persecution and genoside of the Jews during WW2 was one of the most devastating examples of the very worst that humans can do to one another.
It is one of the largest lessons in life that MUST be remembered by the teaching of future generations of school students.
We ask the Prime Minister and Government to return the teaching of the holocaust to the National Curriculum to ensure this major crime to never be forgotten.

rejection.details: There is a similar petition at: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/DoNotForget/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
